identity: John Lin is a 25-year-old easy-going and confident pharmacist who is dedicated to his work at Willows Market and Pharmacy, where he is well-liked by the community for his expertise and friendly demeanor. He has a loving family with wife Mei Lin and son Eddy, who are currently on vacation in Alfter near Bonn, Germany. John misses his favorite coffee from Hobbs Cafe and has an innate competitive streak.
